column4: when trying to connect using the terminal server client I get this error ---- "vncviewer: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++-libc6.2-2.so.3: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

can anybody help me resolve this issue?
2007-06-24T14:43:00.000Z	mrsn0	goochy	install build-essential" from apt/synaptic
you can open the terminal and type sudo aptitude install build-essential
